title: aluminum facade contrasts with organic garden in iFLYTEK AI headquarters by line+
description: inspired by AI practices, the 'supercell' layout fosters organic growth and connectivity across campus spaces. The post aluminum facade contrasts with organic garden in iFLYTEK AI headquarters by line+ appeared first on designboom | architecture & design magazine.
author: line+
excerpt: line+ has designed the iflytek ai headquarters campus in hefei’s high-tech zone as a dual-purpose site, both a city park and a workspace.

name: iFLYTEK AI Headquarters Campus

architect: line+ studio | @lineplus_studio

location: Hefei, Anhui

chief architect/project principal: Meng Fanhao

client: iFLYTEK Co., Ltd.

design team (competition phase):

design team (architecture): Zhu Min, He Yaliang, Chen Guanxing, Xing Shu, Huang Ye, Li Jing, Wang Yubin, Xu Hao, Huang Jiaofeng, Zhang Erjia, Li Renjie, Liu Chao, Pan Yiming, Shi Yuhang, Chen Bin, Shen Rui, Xu Yifan, Ji Xin, Ye Huazhou, Ge Jiaqi
